mainpage.title: This page is dedicated to Soviet rock musician Viktor Tsoy
mainpage.description: 'Tsoi Wall' is the wall of house No. 37 on Arbat, facing Krivoarbatsky Lane in Moscow, which fans of Viktor Tsoi's work have covered with inscriptions 'Cinema', 'Tsoi is alive', quotes from songs and declarations of love to the musician. It is a monument symbol of the Arbat and a landmark of Moscow.
mainpage.infoblock: Our service offers to leave an inscription on the virtual wall of Viktor Tsoi. This will help fans and fans of the musician who do not have the opportunity to visit the 'real' wall, which is located on Arbat Street in Moscow.
